> ratatui-themes: Beautiful color themes for ratatui terminal UI applications

## Overview

ratatui-themes is a Rust library providing 15+ pre-defined color themes for applications built with the ratatui TUI framework. It extracts common theming patterns into a reusable crate with consistent semantic color palettes.

## Key Features

- 15+ popular themes (Dracula, Nord, Catppuccin, Tokyo Night, Gruvbox, etc.)
- Semantic color palette (accent, error, warning, success, info)
- Theme cycling with next()/prev() methods
- Light/dark theme detection
- Optional serde support for config files
- Zero dependencies beyond ratatui

## Quick Start

```rust
use ratatui_themes::{Theme, ThemeName};

let theme = Theme::new(ThemeName::Dracula);
let palette = theme.palette();

// Use palette.accent, palette.bg, palette.error, etc.
```

## Installation

```toml
[dependencies]
ratatui-themes = "0.1"
```
